comment.author: 14032691@N05
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called **Social Documentary Photography & events** (Post 1 Award 5) , and we'd love to have this added to the group! You are invited to add this superb documentary picture to: Social Documentary Photography

comment.author: 86916510@N00
comment._content:
The Prince Edward theatre opened in November 1924. 
The theatre was located between Castlereagh and Elizabeth Streets Sydney, near King Street. It had two entrances, one on Castlereagh and one on Elizabeth. Today the site is occupied by the Verandah building on Castlereagh Street opposite the MLC Centre.

comment.author: 79583367@N02
comment._content: .........and the Wurlitzer theatre organ from the Prince Edward is in good working order at Marrickville Town Hall.
